data.title: Malawi demographics 2024
data.meta_description:
Year wise demographics of Malawi by United Nations. Data tables and
charts.
data.text: There are 10.45 million males and 11.02 million females in Malawi. The percentage of the male population is 48.67%, compared to 51.33% of the female population. Malawi has 571k more females than males. The sex ratio in Malawi in 2024 will be 94.820 males per 100 females. Malawi is in the 48th position in terms of the female-to-male ratio.
